TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Draki, title = Draki, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Draki} }

S.FORM: alang Draki ga niya mki sku Heto Keng atu Botan go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 250 buwan, 618 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 96% kyan ku 594 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 4% kyan ku 24 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Paywan 95%, Bunun 0.5%, binah lihuyan s'uli 0.5%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Draki hya' ga Kus kus. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Draki ga niya mki sko Heto Keng ato Botan go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 250 bowan, 618 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 96% kyan ko 594 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 4% kyan ko 24 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Paywan 95%, Bonon 0.5%, binah lihoyan s'oli 0.5%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Draki hya' ga Kos kos. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
